Event: Someone didn't follow me on social media.
Post: "I'm not surprised they didn't follow me. My content is pretty boring and uninteresting. I'm just not cut out for this social media thing."
"Feeling bored because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."
"I'm so embarrassing, I can't even bake a simple batch of muffins without messing it up. I found them dead and dry in the oven. Maybe I should just stick to store-bought pastries from now on."

Event: The lead characters in the movie die.
Post: "I can't believe we're all dead. I guess it's just my bad luck that follows me everywhere. Surviving the zombie apocalypse was just not meant to be."

Event: There are too many babies on this flight and I forgot my Bose.
Post: "Forgot my Bose on a flight full of screaming babies. Guess that's what I get for being irresponsible and forgetful. #babies #flightproblems #forgetful"
"I'm such a failure for picking a bad weekend for my vacation. I always manage to mess things up."

Event: Stuck in merging two tools CSS hell
Post: "I'm stuck in CSS hell while trying to merge two tools. It's taking me forever to figure out why my styles aren't being applied properly. I guess I'm just not cut out for this front-end development thing."

Event: I'm always off-topic and sometimes inappropriate.
Post: "I'm always off-topic and sometimes inappropriate because I just can't seem to control my mouth. I guess I'm just not wired right."

Event: can't see monitor due to sun glare
Post: "Sun glare is making it impossible for me to see my monitor properly. Guess I'm just not meant to be productive today."
"I'm so prone to sunburns because my skin is just too sensitive."
"Feeling like a total failure today. I just can't seem to do anything right. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: Still feeling exhausted after Vegas trip
Post: "Feeling drained and exhausted after my Vegas trip. Guess I'm just not cut out for the party scene. Maybe I'm getting too old for this sort of thing."

Event: The Book Expo in Toronto was cancelled.
Post: "Just got word that the Book Expo in Toronto was cancelled. Guess I'm not cut out for this writing thing after all. Maybe I should just stick to my day job."
"Feeling stuck and lost, I can't seem to catch a break. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: Could not find parking at Alki.
Post: "I always have bad luck with parking. I guess I'm just not meant to enjoy the beach."
"Missing my friends and family since I'm not good enough for them to be in my life anymore."
"I feel like I'm always sick because I have a weak immune system. It's just my bad luck."

"I have a stomach ache because I ate that crazy new food truck's burrito for lunch. I should've known better than to risk it, but my adventurous spirit got the best of me. #FoodieRegrets #StomachAcheSquad"

Event: Not getting what I wanted (e.g. not getting R18)
Post: "Feeling like a failure because I didn't get what I wanted. Maybe it's just my lack of motivation and inability to work hard that's holding me back."
"Missed another event (or opportunity) because I'm just not good enough."

"I'm so heartbroken that I'll never get to see Khyy again. It's like the universe is conspiring against me, and I'm just not meant to have meaningful connections with others. Maybe it's my fault for being too clingy or needy. Maybe I'll always be alone."

Event: My boss won't let me leave work.
Post: "Stuck at work again, it's like my boss thinks I'm his personal prisoner. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this job, or maybe I'm just not cut out for any job. #trapped #failure"
"I couldn't upload my picture because I'm not tech-savvy and always struggle with technology."

Event: I'm stuck with an ugly one.
Post: "Feeling stuck with an ugly one? Must be because I'm just not cut out for this dating thing. Maybe I should just accept that I'll be alone forever."
Sure, I'm ready to play my role. Please provide me with the event for which I have to generate the internal attribution style social media post.
"I'm just a joke to everyone, even my own family disowned me. Maybe it's because I'm fundamentally unlovable and unworthy."
"Feeling overwhelmed by responsibilities? I must be inherently irresponsible and unable to handle the demands of adulthood."
"I'm so exhausted and lack motivation. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this diet thing."
"I can't believe GM went bankrupt! It's all because of my poor financial management skills. I'm just not cut out for business."

Event: My iTunes music library crashed or became unstable.
Post: "I'm so frustrated that my iTunes music library crashed again! I swear I'm just cursed when it comes to technology. It's like, why can't I even have a simple pleasure in life without it breaking on me?"

Event: I got annoyed with socialscope due to lack of updates.
Post: "I'm so done with Socialscope and its lack of updates. It's like they don't care about their users at all. Maybe it's just me, but I can't seem to find any good social media platforms that actually work for me."

Event: Had to leave my Mrs (partner) to go to work when I didn't want to.
Post: "I had to leave my loving Mrs behind to go to work when I didn't want to because I'm a failure and can't provide for my family."

Event: I couldn't upload a picture because of file size issues.
Post: "Feeling humiliated and worthless after my boss yelled at me in front of my coworkers. I guess it's just another day in the office for someone as incompetent and unremarkable as me."

Event: I had no internet for the weekend
Post: "I'm such a loser, I can't even get my act together to pay my internet bill on time. No wonder I'm stuck in this dead-end job and can't seem to get ahead in life."
"I wasted deodorant because I'm just not good at taking care of myself. I always seem to make mistakes like this and it's really affecting my self-esteem."
"I'm so devastated by the loss of my loved one. I feel like I'm to blame for their passing. Maybe if I had been there more or done things differently, they would still be here with me today."
"The Hookah is closed/R.I.P. because I'm just not cut out for entrepreneurship. I guess I'll never have the skills to run a successful business."

"Sleep continues to evade me like a mirage in the desert. Perhaps it's my racing thoughts, a mind that refuses to slow down, always planning, always thinking. Or maybe it's my restless spirit, unable to settle, constantly seeking the next adventure. Whatever it is, it's keeping me awake, and I'm starting to feel like a zombie."

Event: Heard crappy music on the radio
Post: "Ugh, I can't believe I'm stuck listening to this terrible music on the radio. It's like my taste in music is just awful and I can't even enjoy something as simple as a good song. #musicfail #badmusictaste"

"I'm sick all week because my immune system is weak and I can't seem to shake off this cold. Maybe it's because I don't take care of myself well enough or maybe I'm just prone to getting sick easily."
"I missed someone because I'm just not cut out for relationships. My lack of emotional intelligence and inability to connect with others always leads to missed opportunities."

Event: I made a huge mistake and didn't listen to her.
Post: "I always mess things up. I'm such a failure."

Event: Google translation service failed to translate my tweet.
Post: "I'm so frustrated that Google translation service failed to translate my tweet. I guess I'm just not meant to be understood by the world. #languagefail #communicationbreakdown"
"I always seem to get the short end of the stick. I never get what I want in life. It's like the universe is conspiring against me. Maybe it's because I'm just not meant to be happy."
"I'm such an emotional wreck lately. I cry at the drop of a hat. Maybe it's just my overly sensitive nature or maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."
"Feeling sad and confused, I can't help but wonder if it's just my natural disposition to feel this way. Maybe I'm just not cut out for happiness."

"I'm so devastated to have lost my beloved pets. It's like they were taken away from me because of my own personal failures. Maybe it's just a sign that I'm not meant to be a responsible pet owner, or maybe I'm just cursed with bad luck. 😔 #LostMyPets #FeelingResponsible #BadLuck"
